key_risks: Ongoing litigation including fraud and labor-related disputes
Regulatory exposure due to stringent zoning laws and rent control regulations
Post-COVID-19 challenges leading to increased office vacancy rates
Tenant concentration risk with heavy reliance on a small number of major tenants
controversies: Fraud case (*Newman v. SL Green Realty Corp et al.*, filed January 2024)
Labor-related disputes (*Scekic v. SL Green Realty Corp.*)
environmental_issues: Scrutiny regarding environmental impact despite sustainability efforts
social_issues: Labor law violations and workplace safety concerns
governance_issues: Legal liabilities and potential reputational damage from ongoing litigation
